{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "HR On Wheels - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type:&nbsp;
Work Schedule: Hybrid

Job Summary


	Our Client is seeking a results-driven Business Development Executive to drive new client acquisition and build strong, lasting relationships with existing clients.
	The ideal candidate will be motivated, persuasive, and capable of delivering measurable business growth while maintaining a high level of client satisfaction.


Qualifications


	Proven experience as a Business Development, Sales Executive, or similar role (experience in HR, outsourcing, or B2B services is a plus).
	Strong track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Ability to manage client relationships with professionalism and tact.
	Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to thrive in a commission-based structure.


Remuneration
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly net plus Commission on sales target.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-09",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "HR On Wheels"
    
  },

  },

      "minValue": 150000,

      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Business Development Executive Job at HR On Wheels




        
    

        
        HR On Wheels - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: 
Work Schedule: Hybrid

Job Summary


	Our Client is seeking a results-driven Business Development Executive to drive new client acquisition and build strong, lasting relationships with existing clients.
	The ideal candidate will be motivated, persuasive, and capable of delivering measurable business growth while maintaining a high level of client satisfaction.


Qualifications
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Proven experience as a Business Development, Sales Executive, or similar role (experience in HR, outsourcing, or B2B services is a plus).
	Strong track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Ability to manage client relationships with professionalism and tact.
	Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to thrive in a commission-based structure.


Remuneration
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly net plus Commission on sales target.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales Executive",
  "description": "ZoraBridge Consulting is an HR consulting firm connecting qualified talents to their desired organisation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Structure: Hybrid (4 days onsite, 1-day WFH)

Job Summary


	The preferred candidate will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth for the organization.


Key Responsibilities


	Acquiring and retaining clients: Actively seeking out new business opportunities and building strong relationships with existing clients.
	Conducting sales presentations: Developing and delivering compelling sales presentations to showcase our services and solutions to potential and existing clients
	Developing marketing strategies: Collaborating with our marketing team to create effective marketing strategies and campaigns that align with client objectives.
	Negotiating contracts: Negotiating favorable terms and conditions for advertising contracts.
	Business Development: Identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, building strong relationships with clients, and negotiating contracts.
	Partnership Development: Cultivating partnerships with media outlets, influencers, ad exchange partners and other industry stakeholders to expand our reach and offerings.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree: Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	Experience: 3 - 5 years
	Sales and Business Development: Proven success in sales and business development in the advertising industry.
	Marketing Expertise: Strong understanding of marketing principles with experience in traditional and digital media.
	Presentation Skills: Capable of developing and delivering persuasive sales presentations.
	Communication and Negotiation: Excellent skills in communication and negotiation to build client rapport and close deals.
	Relationship Building: Proven ability to establish and maintain strong relationships with clients and partners.
	Digital Marketing Knowledge: Understanding of programmatic advertising, social media marketing, and other digital marketing trends.


Compensation
Competitive Salary + Commission.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-09",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-25",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "ZoraBridge Consulting"
    
  },

    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {

  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"

}



Sales Executive Job at ZoraBridge Consulting




        
    

        
        ZoraBridge Consulting is an HR consulting firm connecting qualified talents to their desired organisation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Structure: Hybrid (4 days onsite, 1-day WFH)

Job Summary


	The preferred candidate will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth for the organization.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Acquiring and retaining clients: Actively seeking out new business opportunities and building strong relationships with existing clients.
	Conducting sales presentations: Developing and delivering compelling sales presentations to showcase our services and solutions to potential and existing clients
	Developing marketing strategies: Collaborating with our marketing team to create effective marketing strategies and campaigns that align with client objectives.
	Negotiating contracts: Negotiating favorable terms and conditions for advertising contracts.
	Business Development: Identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, building strong relationships with clients, and negotiating contracts.
	Partnership Development: Cultivating partnerships with media outlets, influencers, ad exchange partners and other industry stakeholders to expand our reach and offerings.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree: Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	Experience: 3 - 5 years
	Sales and Business Development: Proven success in sales and business development in the advertising industry.
	Marketing Expertise: Strong understanding of marketing principles with experience in traditional and digital media.
	Presentation Skills: Capable of developing and delivering persuasive sales presentations.
	Communication and Negotiation: Excellent skills in communication and negotiation to build client rapport and close deals.
	Relationship Building: Proven ability to establish and maintain strong relationships with clients and partners.
	Digital Marketing Knowledge: Understanding of programmatic advertising, social media marketing, and other digital marketing trends.


Compensation
Competitive Salary + Commission.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant & Growth Coordinator",
  "description": "Pillarcraft Accounting is a firm of Chartered Accountants and Chartered Tax practitioners operating from two offices in Nigeria, Lekki, Lagos and Garki , Abuja, but virtually supporting small and medium scale business across Nigeria by providing Virtual Bookkeeping, Accounting , Tax management , Payroll management, business advisory and related services that facilitate growth and scale while business owners concentrate on running the business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant &amp; Growth Coordinator

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja, Nigeria
Job Type: Full time

Job Description


	We are looking for a smart, proactive, and business-minded Executive Assistant &amp; Growth Coordinator to support the CEO and drive operational efficiency, brand growth, and client engagement.
	This role offers exposure across executive support, business development, and digital brand management in a fast-growing, technology-driven accounting and cloud solutions firm.
	You will manage high-level administrative tasks, assist in executing sales and marketing activities, improve communication flows, and help maintain a well-structured and productive office environment.


Salary
N350,000 / &nbsp;Month (Gross).",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-09",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Pillarcraft Accounting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "191581"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 250000,
      "maxValue": 400000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Executive Assistant & Growth Coordinator Job at Pillarcraft Accounting




        
    

        
        Pillarcraft Accounting is a firm of Chartered Accountants and Chartered Tax practitioners operating from two offices in Nigeria, Lekki, Lagos and Garki , Abuja, but virtually supporting small and medium scale business across Nigeria by providing Virtual Bookkeeping, Accounting , Tax management , Payroll management, business advisory and related services that facilitate growth and scale while business owners concentrate on running the business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant & Growth Coordinator

Job Location: Abuja, Nigeria
Job Type: Full time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a smart, proactive, and business-minded Executive Assistant & Growth Coordinator to support the CEO and drive operational efficiency, brand growth, and client engagement.
	This role offers exposure across executive support, business development, and digital brand management in a fast-growing, technology-driven accounting and cloud solutions firm.
	You will manage high-level administrative tasks, assist in executing sales and marketing activities, improve communication flows, and help maintain a well-structured and productive office environment.


Salary
N350,000 /  Month (Gross).    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




   


    
        Similar Jobs

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Mobile Developer",
  "description": "Krystal Digital is a full-service ICT company which specializes in the development, research, deployment and creation of customized and service oriented software applications. Our organization has a strong competence in providing secure and continuously available Information technology/infrastructure solutions to organizations, institutions and parastatals as required which helps its clients drive efficiency and improve its service delivery.

The company has several notable products; Krystal IT Academy, Central Billing System, iLearnNG and Myskool portal to her credit alongside other non-disclosed works.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mobile Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse - Zone 7, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled and motivated Mobile Developer to join our team.
	He/she will be responsible for designing, maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code for mobile applications on both iOS and Android platforms.
	You will collaborate with our product, design, and backend teams to deliver a seamless user experience
	This is a Hybrid role


Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
	Write clean, scalable, and efficient code following best practices.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
	Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
	Identify and fix bugs


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in mobile application development (iOS, Android, or cross-platform frameworks like Flutter or React Native).
	Proficient in at least one mobile development language such as Swift (iOS), Kotlin/Java (Android), or Dart (Flutter).
	Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
	Excellent communication and team abilities.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@krystalng.com&nbsp;using &quot;Mobile Developer&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;This is a Hybrid Role.",

Mobile Developer Job at Krystal Digital Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Krystal Digital is a full-service ICT company which specializes in the development, research, deployment and creation of customized and service oriented software applications. Our organization has a strong competence in providing secure and continuously available Information technology/infrastructure solutions to organizations, institutions and parastatals as required which helps its clients drive efficiency and improve its service delivery.

The company has several notable products; Krystal IT Academy, Central Billing System, iLearnNG and Myskool portal to her credit alongside other non-disclosed works.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mobile Developer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Wuse - Zone 7, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled and motivated Mobile Developer to join our team.
	He/she will be responsible for designing, maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code for mobile applications on both iOS and Android platforms.
	You will collaborate with our product, design, and backend teams to deliver a seamless user experience
	This is a Hybrid role


Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
	Write clean, scalable, and efficient code following best practices.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
	Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
	Identify and fix bugs


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in mobile application development (iOS, Android, or cross-platform frameworks like Flutter or React Native).
	Proficient in at least one mobile development language such as Swift (iOS), Kotlin/Java (Android), or Dart (Flutter).
	Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
	Excellent communication and team abilities.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@krystalng.com using "Mobile Developer" as the subject of the email.

Note: This is a Hybrid Role.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Lance Trend Limited
content:
Lance Trend Limited - We are an ICT Company which deals in all brands of IT Gadgets. We are an ICT Firm, Solely Indigenous Company with all its Directors from the Okolies' Family.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Driver / Dispatch Rider

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Driver / Dispatch Rider is responsible for transporting goods, documents, and sometimes passengers safely and efficiently.
	They ensure timely deliveries, maintain vehicles/motorcycles in good condition, and uphold company standards of professionalism and customer service.


Responsibilities
Transportation & Delivery:


	Safely drive company vehicles or motorcycles to deliver packages, documents, or goods.
	Ensure timely pickup and drop-off of items to clients, offices, or designated locations.
	Verify delivery details and obtain necessary signatures or proof of delivery.


Vehicle / Motorcycle Maintenance:


	Conduct routine checks on vehicles/motorcycles (fuel, oil, brakes, tires).
	Report mechanical issues promptly and schedule servicing when required.
	Keep vehicles/motorcycles clean and roadworthy.


Documentation & Compliance:


	Maintain accurate delivery logs and records.
	Ensure compliance with traffic laws and safety regulations.
	Handle cash or receipts responsibly when required.


Customer Service:


	Interact politely and professionally with clients during deliveries.
	Provide updates on delivery status when necessary.
	Represent the company positively in all interactions.


Requirements


	Education: Minimum of high school certificate.
	Licensing: Valid driver’s license or rider’s permit (depending on role).
	Experience: Previous experience as a driver or dispatch rider preferred.
	Skills:
	
		Good knowledge of local routes and traffic regulations.
		Strong time management and organizational skills.
		Ability to work independently and handle pressure.
		Basic technicalknowledge is an advantage.
	
	


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: hr@lancetrend.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Executive Assistant

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The Executive Assistant provides high-level administrative support to senior executives, ensuring efficient operations, effective communication, and strategic coordination. This role requires discretion, organizational excellence, and the ability to anticipate the needs of leadership.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Manage executive calendars, schedule meetings, and coordinate appointments.
	Organize travel arrangements, itineraries, and accommodations.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and briefing materials.


Communication Management:


	Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence (emails, calls, memos).
	Act as a liaison between executives and internal/external stakeholders.
	Draft and edit professional communications on behalf of executives.


Operational Coordination:


	Track project deadlines, deliverables, and follow-ups.
	Assist in organizing board meetings, conferences, and corporate events.


Strategic Assistance:


	Conduct research and compile data for executive decision-making.
	Monitor priorities and ensure executives are prepared for engagements.
	Provide insights and recommendations to improve workflow efficiency.


Skills & Qualifications


	Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or related field (preferred) with 1-4 years experience.
	Experience: Proven track record in executive support or senior administrative roles.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, scheduling software, and communication tools.
	Soft Skills: Strong organizational ability, discretion, adaptability, problem-solving, and excellent communication.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV to: hr@lancetrend.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Receptionist / Secretary

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	A Secretary / Receptionist is responsible for managing front-office operations, handling communications, and providing administrative support to ensure smooth daily functioning of theorganization.


Responsibilities
Front Desk Management:


	Greet and assist visitors, clients, and staff in a professional manner.
	Answer, screen, and forward phone calls; take messages when necessary.
	Maintain a welcoming reception area.


Administrative Support:


	Handle typing, filing, photocopying and scanningtasks.
	Schedule and confirm appointments or meetings.
	Maintain office records, databases, and filing systems.
	Process incoming and outgoing mail.


Communication:


	Draft and distribute correspondence such as emails, memos, and letters.
	Relay information between departments and external contacts


Operational Assistance:


	Monitor office supplies and place orders when needed.
	Support HR or management with clerical tasks.
	Coordinate travel arrangements and meeting logistics.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND qualification with 1-3 years of exxperience.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Soft Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication, organizational ability, multitasking, and customer service orientation.
	Experience: Prior experience in administrative or receptionist roles ispreferred.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV to: hr@lancetrend.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
